        public long identifier()
        Description copied from interface: Layout

      • compatibleWith

        public boolean compatibleWith​(long layoutIdentifier,
                              int majorVersion,
                              int minorVersion)
        Description copied from interface: Layout
        Typically, a layout is compatible with given identifier, major and minor version if
        • layoutIdentifier == this.identifier()
        • majorVersion == this.majorVersion()
        • minorVersion == this.minorVersion()

        When opening a tree to 'use' it, read and write to it, providing a layout with the right compatibility is important because it decides how to read and write entries in the tree.

        Specified by:
        compatibleWith in interface Layout<KEY,​VALUE>
        Parameters:
        layoutIdentifier - the stored layout identifier we want to check compatibility against.
        majorVersion - the stored major version we want to check compatibility against.
        minorVersion - the stored minor version we want to check compatibility against.
        Returns:
        true if this layout is compatible with combination of identifier, major and minor version, false otherwise.
